department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Media Production Specialist at DePaul University.<br>Production Specialist for DePaul Blue Demon Teams.<br><br>Lecturer (Graphics/Animation/Multimedia) at College of Computing & Digital Media and College of Commerce, DePaul University<br><br>B.S. in Industrial Design & Architecture Design, M.S. in Computer Graphics & Animation and M.S. in Digital Cinema.<br><br>Animator, Filmmaker, Photographer. Lecturer at DePaul University, College of Computing and Digital Media since 2002; Lecturer at DePaul University, College of Commerce since 2010.<br><br>Main interests are NPAR (None Photorealistic Animation and Rendering) and making films.
